page.title: 13ARTS AND CRAFTS
page.content: Mr.Scottsan makes furniture. His favourite wood is mahogany which is very good and strong for furniture making. Mr.Centofanti does leather work. Since leather is so supple lots of things can be made from it such as mats with plaited edges. Mrs.Hemming and Mrs.Taylor carry on the craft of tapestry which is illustrating something on canvas by stitching in a certain way. Mrs.Horley makes lots of things from patchwork. Mrs.Claridge does, or has done, a lot of crafts, including toymaking, painting and making night dress cases etc. She raffles them for charity. Mrs.Atkins makes lace. There are over 700 different kinds of lace making, but Mrs.Atkins does bobbin lace. Mrs. McCalloch has been an artist for almost 50 years. Many crafts are still practised in Langton Green.
